entries.journal_entry_description: In order to maximize the value of the information you and Lercer has come across, Lercer has suggested to get more information about Station Gammas side of things. His first idea is to dismantle some of the droids there and scan their databanks for any clues.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Look for the Shuttle Droid in Hangarabay 1.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Use the Gamma Shuttle Service to Travel to Station Gamma
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Find and destroy droids in Station Gamma. Once they are defeated, check if their databanks have any clues to what you and Lercer are investigating.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Find and destroy droids in Station Gamma
entries.task02_comm_message_text: That's a security code for data files in the Rak'qua network. They have figured out that something is wrong though and are about to switch the security codes! You have only 10 minutes to use that code before it becomes useless!
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: On one of the droids you found a security code that will unlock secret files in Station Gamma's data network. Lercer has provided you with a waypoint to a computer terminal that you can try to use. The Rak'qua has figured out what is going on though and are switching the codes! You only have ten minutes before your code becomes useless.
entries.task04_comm_message_text: Sorry my friend, they have changed the codes. You have to start over with the droid hunting.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Find and destroy droids in Station Gamma. Once they are defeated, check if their databanks have any clues to what you and Lercer are investigating.
entries.task06_comm_message_text: Excellent, a new code! This one is high level as well. It will take them half a day to change it! Head over to the computer terminal and crack those files.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: On one of the droids you found a security code that will unlock secret files in Station Gamma's data network. Lercer has provided you with a waypoint to a computer terminal that you can try to use.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: You have the files that Lercer and you need. Return to Tansarii point station when ready.
entries.task08_journal_entry_title: Use the Gamma Shuttle to Return to Station Gamma
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Take the files from Station Gamma back to Lercer.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: You have the files that Lercer and you need. Return to Tansarii point station when ready.
entries.task11_journal_entry_title: Use the Gamma Shuttle to Return to Station Gamma
entries.task12_journal_entry_description: Take the files from Station Gamma back to Lercer.
